channel.title: Walking on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Walking on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A graceful dancer was walking, An enviable stride she was flocking, Her feet moved so light, Her grace was a sight, Her walk a true wonder …
A waiter was strolling and walking, He was out on a leisurely saunter. His steps were quite light, For his shift ended at night, And he …
A jeweler who was out for a stroll, Felt his heart swell with joy in his soul. He loved nature’s grace, Each step filled with grace, And his …
An artist found walking outdoors one day, In awe of nature, she stopped to survey. A paintbrush in hand, The scene she command, Creating her …
An astronaut was strolling around, He wanted to get off the ground. In his space suit and cap, He took a quick lap, To the stars he would …
A clumsy clown who was walking around Had a gait that was clumsy and bound He’d walk off the path And sometimes would laugh For the circus, …
A tailor out walking, with thoughts quite profound, Observing each seamstress with needle and round, He found the task daunting, the job …
A model who was out on the street Was sashaying down with two feet She moved with such grace Her pose such a case That she made passersby’s …
